definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: Clever newspaper ad for new McDonald’s sandwich in Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 聰明的瑞典麥當勞新款三明治報紙廣告。

sentences.english: There's no doubt that some of the new XTR's features make it very desirable.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，新款XTR的一些特性是非常吸引人的。

sentences.english: The BenQ T60 is the newest slimline handset from the Taiwan-based cell phone maker.
sentences.chinese: 明基T60是臺灣手機制造商生產的最新款超薄手機。

sentences.english: This is the latest car —Xiali N3 which was introduced last year. And the price is not expensive.
sentences.chinese: 這是去年剛推出的最新款夏利N3，它的價格也不貴。

sentences.english: Outside the middle of second-hand clothes shop to match the latest LV bag.
sentences.chinese: 外着中古店淘來的二手衣服搭配LV最新款的紙袋。

sentences.english: I put the new trends that are out. So you know,
sentences.chinese: 我會把最新款的放在外面的位置。所以，

sentences.english: Better half: A cross-sectioned new Buick on display at the Shanghai auto show on April 20.
sentences.chinese: 4月20日上海車展，新款別克車的橫截面。

sentences.english: RIM is also preparing to launch new phones based on software from QNX, which RIM acquired last year.
sentences.chinese: 該公司還準備推出基於QNX軟件的新款手機。

sentences.english: The new tablet computer also lacks a proximity sensor.
sentences.chinese: 這種新款的平板電腦也沒有接近傳感器。

sentences.english: For her birthday, he bought her a brand new bathroom scale.
sentences.chinese: 爲了她的生日，他給她買了最新款的浴室磅秤。

sentences.english: The newly-designed jewellery is full of originality.
This is a new type of self-winding watch.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種新款的自動上弦手錶。

sentences.english: And the new Moroccan-inspired， bead-and-jewel-encrusted styles will showcase your inner diva.
sentences.chinese: 新款摩洛哥風情的珠寶配飾則更能展現你的內在氣質。

sentences.english: The new Camry will have a lot to live up to.
sentences.chinese: 新款凱美瑞將沿襲過去的一系列優勢。

sentences.english: Airbus has had delays with its huge, new A-Three-Eighty passenger plane.
sentences.chinese: 因此空中客車推遲了新款巨型A380客機的生產。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Porsche launched its new sedan in China first.
sentences.chinese: 同時，保時捷首次在中國推出其新款私家車。

definition: exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)
to transition to a new dynasty or regime/to replace an older product with an upgraded, new-generation one
look/external appearance/design/overall brand look or logo that can be patented
